meanings.definition: The soft undercoat of the muskox, valued for its warmth and used in making luxury garments.
meanings.sent1: The qiviuts of the muskox provide excellent insulation against the cold.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful qiviuts sweater to stay warm in the winter.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to steal the qiviuts to make a cozy nest.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a layer of qiviuts, warming everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The luxurious qiviuts scarf felt like a gentle hug around her neck.

meanings.definition: A garment made from the wool of the muskox.
meanings.sent1: He proudly displayed his new qiviuts at the fashion show.
meanings.sent2: The qiviuts she knitted was the softest thing he had ever worn.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer created a qiviuts suit for the adventurous explorer.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was like a tailored qiviuts, fitting perfectly in any situation.
meanings.sent5: The elegant qiviuts dress shimmered under the lights of the runway.
